itainteasybeinggreen.name: It Ain't Easy Being Green
itainteasybeinggreen.description: Collect one of every Room card with the Discontinued rarity!

unlucky.name: Unlucky
unlucky.description: Collect 10 exact copies of a card!

bronzecollector.name: Bronze Collector
bronzecollector.description: Collect 20 cards with the type of 'Rare'!

silversaver.name: Silver Saver
silversaver.description: Collect 20 cards with the type of 'Super Rare'!

goldhoarder.name: Gold Hoarder
goldhoarder.description: Collect 20 cards with the type of 'Ultra Rare'!

editorenthusiast.name: Editor Enthusiast
editorenthusiast.description: Collect all non-DC rarites of the Sound, VFX, Rows, and Rooms cards!
